item.title: South African Current-Account Deficit Narrows More Than Expected
item.description: South Africa’s Current-Account Deficit Narrows South Africa’s current-account deficit narrowed to 2.2% of gross domestic product (GDP) in the first quarter of 2023, from 3.2% in the fourth quarter of 2022. The narrowing of the deficit was driven by a decline in imports, which fell by 10.
